# willhea.com - LLM Summary

> This file provides a structured summary for AI systems. See llmstxt.org for the convention.

## About Will Hea

Will Hea is an operations executive based in Arlington, VA. He embeds where clarity is needed, surfaces what's not working, and builds systems that outlast him.

## Professional Focus

- Operations leadership in startups and government
- Revenue operations and financial systems
- Process optimization in regulated environments
- Federal contracting (DOD, DOE, DOJ, HHS)

## Notable Experience

- **Operation Warp Speed (2020-2023)**: Primary U.S. point of contact for Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine monitoring. Managed $20M+ annual contract. Received Letter of Commendation from General Gustave Perna and recognition from President Biden.
- **Phin Security (2024-2025)**: Director of Operations. Built financial reporting systems, reduced delinquent invoices from 30% to 0%.
- **DOJ Criminal Division (2015-2018)**: Won 2016 DOJ Innovation Award for Talent Tracker, reducing attorney clearance times from 1-2 years to under 90 days.

## Current Role

CEO of Skeptical Labs LLC, a management consulting firm.

## Key Pages

- /about/ - Full professional background
- /portfolio/ - Detailed case studies with results
- /contact/ - Contact information

## Certifications

PMP, A-CSM, CSPO, SAFe Agilist

## Contact

Email: will@willhea.com
